testsuite.test:
Check that phoneMSISDN is not empty
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Check value of phoneMSISDN
Instructions: 1) Try to find out your Mobile Directory Number (MDN) and not the Mobile Identification Number (MIN) 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the above phoneMSISDN correct?

Check that phoneOperatorName is not empty
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

phoneOperatorName
Instructions: 1) Make sure you know the operator's name of this phone (e.g. Vodafone UK). 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the shown operator name correct?

Check that phoneUserUniqueId is not empty
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

userAccountBalance
Instructions: 1) Make sure you know your account balance. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the above account balance correct?

Check that userSubscriptionType is not empty
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

userSubscriptionType
Instructions: 1) Make sure you know your subscription type, e.g. prepaid, postpaid or other. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the shown subscription type correct?
